sourcesContent:
DBZ Characters

  • {{ character.name }} - Power: {{ character.power }}
import { Character } from './../../interfaces/character.interface'; import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dbz-list-characters', templateUrl: './list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list.component.css'] }) export class ListCharactersComponent { @Input() public characterList: Character[] = [{ name: 'Trunks', power: 500 }] }
